rationale: 'fatal' is a risk-adjective, but it is not modified by an intensifier or comparative.
statement_text: One version of the virus has caused 863 human infections in 18 countries since 2003, according to the World Health Organization. Of those [863 human infections], 455 were fatal.

rationale: The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, metaphors, or intensifiers.
